## [camunda-platform-11.12.0](https://github.com/camunda/camunda-platform-helm/releases/tag/camunda-platform-11.12.0) (2026-02-26)

### Features

- Expose options in values.yaml for helm v4 support (#4918)

### Verification

For quick verification of the Helm chart integrity using [Cosign](https://docs.sigstore.dev/signing/quickstart/):

```shell
cosign verify-blob camunda-platform-11.12.0.tgz \
  --bundle "camunda-platform-11.12.0-cosign-bundle.json" \
  --certificate-identity-regexp "https://github.com/camunda/camunda-platform-helm" \
  --certificate-oidc-issuer "https://token.actions.githubusercontent.com"
```

For detailed verification instructions, check the steps in the `camunda-platform-11.12.0-cosign-verify.sh` file.
